merpi_desc: %USER's arms, strong or gentle they're there just waiting for you to...?

merpi_normal: %USER puts %TARGET's %T_PART into a fucking chokehold! Look out, look out, look out!!
merpi_flowery: %USER wraps their arms tightly around %TARGET's %T_PART, hand locking to wrist and putting it in a chokehold! Look out, look out, look out!!
%USER takes %TARGET's %T_PART into their arms. It's a gentle hold, maybe even sweet.

merpi_normal: %USER presses their elbow into %TARGET's %T_PART, firmly but carefully.
merpi_flowery: %USER leans in and presses the tip of their elbow into %TARGET's %T_PART. As they do so they begin to apply a steady pressure to try and remove tension.
%USER wraps their arms around %TARGET's %T_PART claiming clear ownership.

merpi_normal: %USER digs their elbow into %TARGET's %T_PART, rubbing it deep.
merpi_flowery: %USER rolls their elbow firmly against %TARGET's %T_PART, the pressure digging in deep to try and ease tension.
%USER uses their arms to give %TARGET's %T_PART a big hug!

merpi_normal: %USER is trying to crush %TARGET's %T_PART with their elbow like Arnie!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses their elbow down so hard into %TARGET's %T_PART that it almost certainly hurts like hell!
%USER tightly squeezes their arms around %TARGET's %T_PART. Putting every ounce of their strength into the action as they squish it!

merpi_normal: %USER absolutely cranks %TARGET's %T_PART with their elbow, cracking something!
merpi_flowery: %USER finally gets the angle just right with their elbow against %TARGET's %T_PART. They then press down deeply and sharply, causing it to crack loudly!
